channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump deploys California National Guard to LA to quell protests despite the governor’s objections
item.description: President Donald Trump is deploying 2,000 California National Guard troops despite the governor’s objections to Los Angeles, where protests led to clashes between immigration authorities and demonstrators.

item.title: Trump officials are vowing to end school desegregation orders. Some parents say they’re still needed
Travel ban may shut door for Afghan family to bring niece to US for a better life
